name: Create Animated Baby Podcast Videos with GPT, DALL-E, ElevenLabs and Hedra

user.name: Adam Crafts
user.bio: As an experienced AI Agent Builder, I specialize in creating intelligent solutions tailored to enhance automation, streamline operations, and drive innovation. üõ†Ô∏è My passion lies in transforming ideas into functional AI agents that deliver tangible results.

description:
## üöÄ Overview

This workflow is your personal content creation studio for social media. It takes a simple idea and a few descriptive words and automatically produces a complete, ready-to-share video of a custom-designed baby hosting their own podcast. It's the ultimate tool for creating unique, funny, and engaging content that captures attention and drives shares.

![The Prospects of AI in 1600 x 1200 px.png](fileId:1586)

## üò© The Problem

Creating animated video content is a massive headache. Manually, you'd have to:
1.  Hire or be a skilled graphic designer to create the character.
2.  Write a clever and engaging script.
3.  Find a voice actor to record the audio.
4.  Use complex and expensive animation software to make the character's mouth and expressions match the audio.
5.  Render and export the final video.

This process is incredibly time-consuming, requires specialized skills, and can cost hundreds or even thousands of dollars for a single short video. The barrier to creating fun, viral content is just too high.

## ‚ú® The Solution

This workflow acts as your automated video production team! It elegantly handles the entire creation process from start to finish. Here‚Äôs how it works:

1.  **üéôÔ∏è Design Your Star:** You start by filling out a simple form to design your baby podcaster. You choose their ethnicity, hair style, outfit, and even how chubby their cheeks are. You also give them a topic to discuss.
2.  **‚úçÔ∏è Generate a Script & Image:** Instantly, the automation writes a short podcast script using OpenAI (GPT-4) and generates a unique, photorealistic image of your baby with DALL-E.
3.  **üó£Ô∏è Bring it to Life:** It then creates a voice for your baby using the script (via ElevenLabs) and animates the baby's face to talk and express themselves perfectly in sync with the audio (via Hedra).
4.  **üìÇ Deliver the Final Cut:** The final, ready-to-post video is automatically rendered and saved directly into a designated Google Drive folder. Your viral video is ready to be shared with the world in just a few minutes!

## ‚öôÔ∏è Simple Setup

This workflow is a pre-built blueprint, designed to be up and running in minutes!

* **1. Upload:** Simply upload the provided JSON file into your n8n instance.
* **2. Detailed Setup:** Follow all the instructions of the Detailed Setup.
* **3. Activate:** Turn the workflow on, and it's ready to go! Let your new automated employee get to work.

---
üåê Explore more workflows
‚ù§Ô∏è Buy more workflows at: [adamcrafts](https://adamcrafts.cloudysoftwares.com)
[automations](https://automations.cloudysoftwares.com)
ü¶æ Custom workflows at: [adamcrafts@cloudysoftwares.com](mailto:adamcrafts@cloudysoftwares.com)
[adamaicrafts@gmail.com](mailto:adamaicrafts@gmail.com)


> Build once, customize endlessly, and scale your video content like never before.
